content: What is the process for BMD to submit NEFT details?
BMD can submit NEFT details via the Web Portal by logging into their account and filling out the required fields under the NEFT section.
Can FR submit NEFT details on behalf of a customer?
Yes, FR can submit NEFT details on behalf of a customer through the Mobile Application, provided they have the correct information.
Is there any deadline for submitting NEFT details?
NEFT details must be submitted during the enrollment or Geo Verification process to avoid delays in approval and payouts.
What happens if incorrect NEFT details are submitted?
If incorrect NEFT details are submitted, the payout process will fail. The details must be corrected and resubmitted for successful processing.
Can NEFT details be submitted offline?
No, NEFT details must be submitted online via the Web Portal or Mobile Application to ensure accurate and timely processing.
Does the Mobile Application support NEFT updates for all user roles?
Yes, the Mobile Application allows NEFT updates for all user roles, from FR to User.
How will the customer know if their NEFT details are successfully submitted?
Upon successful submission, the system will display a confirmation message, and the customer will receive a notification.
Who verifies NEFT submissions made through the Web Portal?
NEFT submissions made through the Web Portal are verified by the Area Manager (AM) during the approval process.
Can a customer directly submit their NEFT details?
Yes, customers can directly submit their NEFT details through the Mobile Application if they have access to the required platform.
What should be done if the Web Portal is not accessible for NEFT submission?
If the Web Portal is inaccessible, users can submit NEFT details through the Mobile Application or contact techsupport@pearlcomp.com for assistance.
